griffon.javafx.test

Class GriffonTestFXClassRule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.testfx.api.FxRobot
      • griffon.javafx.test.TestFX
        • griffon.javafx.test.GriffonTestFXClassRule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.rules.TestRule, org.testfx.api.FxRobotInterface

    public class GriffonTestFXClassRule
extends TestFX
implements org.junit.rules.TestRule
    A JUnit Rule that starts the application once per test class. Use it in combination with FunctionalJavaFXRunner.
    Since:
    2.3.0
    Author:
    Andres Almiray
    See Also:
    FunctionalJavaFXRunner
